overview: The story of a women's football team, the Thokozani Football Club, which isn't quite like the others. The film takes us in the footsteps of the players on the clay grounds of Umlazi township, during matches in Durban or in their daily lives. It is in team that they chose to fight lesbophobia but also to share in the field their joy of being visible.
title: Thokozani Football Club: Team Spirit
